product_name: Maui Jim Ginger Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Maui Jim Ginger polarized sunglasses feature a feminine, modern shape for style, and amazing optics for all-day clarity. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. MauiGradient lense features a darker coating at the top that gets lighter moving down the lense, allowing enough light to filter through in some areas. Chocolate frame option features HCL(R) Bronze lenses, ideal for variable conditions from sun to overcast. Mauve frame option features Maui Rose lenses for everyday variable conditions; they offer the highest contrast available from Maui Jim. Glass lenses offer amazing optical clarity and are scratch resistant. Lightweight acetate frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely durable. Anti-corrosive springs provide flexibility and a secure fit for all face shapes and sizes. The Maui Jim Ginger polarized sunglasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Ginger polarized sunglasses feature a feminine, modern shape for style, and amazing optics for all-day clarity.
